table_name: Industry Financial Metrics and Risk Analysis
table_summary: This table provides a detailed financial analysis and risk assessment of various industries. It includes metrics such as the number of firms, beta values, debt-to-equity ratio, effective tax rate, unlevered beta, cash as a percentage of firm value, and various risk measures. The data spans multiple years (2020-2023) and includes average values over a period (2019-2023), offering a comprehensive overview of the financial health and risk profile of different industries. This information is crucial for investors, analysts, and financial professionals to make informed decisions.
